original_text: 簾外芭蕉惹驟雨門環惹銅綠The banana tree outside brings a sudden downpour; While the copper knocker invites rust to cover all. 而我路過那江南小鎮惹了妳South of the river I passed through the small town, Mindless of turning your life around.(這是前武漢新東方校長李杜幫我翻譯的歌詞)
